main.title: 1st Place
contents: $4000 cash
Amazon Echo Show 8 for each team member
$100 MyDeal gift card for each team member

main.title: 2nd Place
contents: $2000 cash
Lenovo Smart Clock 2 for each team member

main.title: 3rd Place
contents: $1000 cash
JBL Link Bluetooth Speaker for each team member

category.title: Best Design
category.description: Awarded to the most usable and best looking user interface.
contents: Adobe Creative Cloud Subscription for each team member

category.title: Most Creative Idea
category.description: The project that has the most original idea or reinvention.
contents: Wacom One tablet for each team member

category.title: Local Impact Prize
category.description: The best idea that addresses an issue in your local community.
contents: Frank Green Tap-to-Pay Reusable Cup for each team member

category.title: First Timers Prize
category.description: The best project created by first-time hackathon participants.
category.subtext: To be eligible, at least 50% of your team must have not attended a hackathon.
contents: Logitech G213 Mechanical Keyboard for each team member

category.title: Most Entertaining Pitch
category.description: Can you summarise your pitch in in three minutes - whilst also being engaging and entertaining?
contents: Amazon Echo Dot for each team member

category.title: People's Choice Award
category.description: The project that wins the hearts and votes of the people.
contents: Morphie Charge Stream Powerstation for each team member

category.title: Best Social Media Prize
category.description: Send out the best tweet, message, photo, story or short video that sums up your experience of #UNIHACK2022.
contents: TBA

category.title: Best Meme
category.description: Make the best meme during the event and post it on the UNIHACK Discord. I couldn't make it any more obvious.
contents: Totally a secret

sponsor.title: Global Social Impact Prize
sponsor.description: The best idea that addresses one of the UN Sustainable Development Goals or another global issue in our society today
contents: $1000 in total of JB Hi-Fi Gift Cards (for the entire team)

sponsor.title: Most Scalable Prize
sponsor.description: Do you have a big dream? Are you someone who likes to think large? The most scalable hack will be awarded to the team that is able to roll out their idea on scale in a big kind of way! This could be via streamlining, outsourcing, automation, or speed!
contents: An internship with Bukalapak for each team member

sponsor.title: Most Innovative Hack
sponsor.description: We're on the hunt for the most innovative hack which sparks enthusiasm, improves quality of life and helps conserve natural resources whilst through an honest and fair approach.
contents: A 3D printer for the entire team

sponsor.title: Food Waste Warrior Prize
sponsor.description: There's enough food produced in the world to feed everyone - and a third of food produced is wasted. This prize goes to the team that can solve the problem of food wastage at any point in the food supply chain.
contents: TBA

sponsor.title: Engineering Excellence Prize
sponsor.description: Engineers, we want to see you innovate in solving problems and demonstrate passion in the ways you can create and deliver your solution
contents: A pair of Apple AirPod Pros for each team member
A session with Macquarie engineers with tech experience relevant to your team

sponsor.title: Creative Pitch Prize
sponsor.description: We are looking for the most compelling and quality pitch! Tell us your story, sell your idea to us and don't be afraid to get creative and incorporate other digital tools and technology!
contents: Jabra Elite 85T True Wireless ANC In-Ear Headphones
Samsung Galaxy Watch 3
Logitech G PRO X Mechanical Gaming Keyboard

sponsor.title: Data Analytics Prize
sponsor.description: Calling all data lovers! We are looking for compelling insights derived from data. Incorporate data analytics and visualisation incorporated as part of your final solution and as part of the pitch.
contents: Logitech G PRO X Superlight Wireless Gaming Mouse
Beats Fit Pro True Wireless Noise Cancelling Earbuds
Fitbit Versa 2 Smart Fitness Watch

sponsor.title: The Customer Experience Award
sponsor.description: Awarded to the team who delivers the project that has the best customer experience for its users
contents: $300 Coles Myer Gift Card for each team member

sponsor.title: Ig UNIHACK Prize
sponsor.description: This is a satiric prize awarded to the unusual or trivial hacks, the aim being to "honour achievements that first make people laugh, and then make them think."
contents: TBA
